document_data.name: Crypt of Augathra the Mad
document_data.mainbody: The '''crypt of Augathra the Mad''' was located in the ruins of the [[Netheril|Netherese]] floating citadel of [[Synod]].
document_data.History: [[Augathra the Mad]] found the ruins around {{Yearlink|-390}} and, discovering a unique interaction between the [[Weave]] and the [[Sharn Wall]], stayed to research a way to end her dark torment as the chronicler of the [[Black Chronology]].
